mapper.insert: insert into reply(reply_no, reply_content, reply_origin, reply_member_no, reply_time, reply_parent, reply_like) values (reply_seq.nextval, #{replyContent}, #{replyOrigin}, #{replyMemberNo}, sysdate, #{replyParent}, #{replyLike})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM reply_with_nick where reply_origin=#{replyOrigin} CONNECT BY PRIOR reply_no = COALESCE(reply_parent, 0) START WITH COALESCE(reply_parent, 0) = 0 order siblings by reply_no ASC
mapper.update: update reply set reply_like = #{count} where reply_no = #{replyNo}
update reply set reply_report = (select count(*) from report where report_table='reply' and report_table_no=#{replyNo} and report_check=0) where reply_no=#{replyNo}
